title: Don’t Count Out the Ham and Egger
description: A former boxer working in a string factory doesn’t have much left in him. He agrees to fight to earn enough for a meal. A tale of love, loss, blood, and revenge.
altHero: a shirtless boxer in the ring
alt1: the shirtless boxer getting ready to punch a big spool of string
alt2: the boxer in a hoodie visiting a lady friend and presenting her with some string from a paper bag
alt3: a blonde boxer gets punched in the face
alt4: our shirtless boxer looking defeated on the floor of the ring while the referee counts and his lady friend looks concerned
